articles.title: Former Colombian President Ãlvaro Uribe found guilty in witness tampering case
articles.content: Ãlvaro Uribe, president of Colombia from 2002 to 2010, was found guilty Monday of bribery in a witness tampering case. The judge is still reading the sentence. He maintained that position throughout the 67-day trial, during which he clashed with Senator IvÃ¡n Cepeda, of the ruling Pacto HistÃ³rico party. This is a developing story and will be updated.

articles.content: The Land Transport Authority (LTA) announced on Sunday that the closure affects the road between Mountbatten Road and East Coast Parkway (ECP)

articles.title: Tanjong Katong sinkhole: What to do if your vehicle falls into one
articles.content: Last Saturday (July 26), the ground opened beneath her, swallowing her â€” and her vehicle â€” whole. She reportedly exited the vehicle on her own. A section of Tanjong Katong Road South has since been closed until further notice amid urgent repair works, the Land Transport Authority announced on Sunday. Responding to queries from AsiaOne, the Automobile Association of Singapore (AAS) shared some essential steps to keeping safe...
